GSD.description:
ext4: fix ext4_mb_mark_bb() with flex_bg with fast_commit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 6a6beb074186a0452368a023a261c7d0eaebe838. For more details please see the references link.
